title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.22 - Appointment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.22 - Appointment

State Regulations

Appointment as distinguished professor, distinguished
service professor, distinguished teaching professor, distinguished librarian or
university professor may be given by action of the board of trustees on
recommendation of the chancellor and shall be a continuing
appointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
